column4: hey guys i would like to set/up use ethereal.. anyone got any tips? good links? i have absolutely no idea what to do with it

because i want to know if im being snooped on etc

you mean you want to know if you have spyware?

it doesn't
that's my point
that wasent really my concern
well, anyway
just install it like any other program

sudo apt-get install ethereal
